Deposit Status Submitted Approved Declined CHECK PHOTOS Front Back Deposit Info There are no deposits to display DEPOSIT TO DEPOSITED TO Amount CHECK PHOTOS Snap photos of the front and back Deposit checks to your account easily by taking a picture, just follow these steps:
  1. Sign the back of your check; write "For Deposit only at BPPR" and the account number.

  2. Snap photos of the front and back of the check.

  • We reserve the right to refuse any image for processing.
  • Deposit made before 6:00 pm on Business Day will be processed on the same day, subject to deposit verification and validation.
  • Once accepted, your deposit will be available according to our Availability of Funds Policy.
  • Deposit limits: $1,500 per check, $1,500 per day total and $4,500 per month.
  • For more information about Mobile Easy Deposit and our Availability of Funds Policy, visit popular.com.

You can reach us at 787-294-2578 or 1-888-724-3655 option #3 Mi Banco Mobile will only request permissions and necessary personal data for the use of the application. It’s important that you know how we collect and use your data and how you can control or restrict it. Popular uses this information to provide a better user experience, improve our services and protect your information. Some of the permissions and data we request include: Phone permissions: Media and Storage permissions: Contact permissions: Notification permissions: Offer and improve customer experience and for security purposes. We also use your phone number in the following services: 2 Step Verification, Mi Banco Alerts and for sending and receiving cash with Mobile Withdrawal. Improve customer experience, personalization, and receipt storage. Facilitate sending cash to your contacts with Mobile Withdrawal. Receive push notifications from our app, including Mi Banco Alerts service. Access our Privacy Policy to learn how we protect your personal information. The application permissions will be found when accepting this information and you must accept each one to continue using Mi Banco Mobile.
